text: Eric William Dane (born November 9, 1972) is an American actor. He played Jason Dean in Charmed. He also played Dr. Mark Sloan on the ABC medical drama television series Grey's Anatomy. In April 2025, Dane announced his diagnosis of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Eric Dane
